critique: This is an executive order to exempt a special agent from compulsory retirement. It is a fairly routine administrative action. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, federalism implications, or social inclusion impact. It has a slight impact on executive power, as it is an executive order, but it is not a major expansion. It has a slight impact on national security, as it retains a special agent, but it is not a major focus. It has no impact on economic regulation.
